media.headline: Archer's first pitch
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Archer delivers the first pitch of the season
media.bigblurb: Chris Archer delivers the first pitch of the 2017 MLB season as the Rays take on the Yankees on Opening Day

media.team: New York Yankees Tampa Bay Rays
media.headline: Miller nabs Holliday
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Miller throws out Holliday, call stands
media.bigblurb: Brad Miller fields a grounder by Matt Holliday and flips to first base for the out, which stands following a Yankees challenge in the 1st

media.headline: Archer gets hit by a comebacker
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Archer gets hit by a grounder, gets the out
media.bigblurb: Chris Archer gets hit by a comebacker off the bat of Gary Sanchez and tosses to first base for the out in the 1st inning

media.headline: Longoria's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Longoria plates the first run with a sac fly
media.bigblurb: Evan Longoria lifts a sacrifice fly to right field, scoring Corey Dickerson to give the Rays a 1-0 lead in the 1st inning

media.headline: Morrison's two-run single
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Morrison plates two with a single in the 1st
media.bigblurb: Logan Morrison rips a single up the middle, plating two runs to give the Rays a 3-0 lead in the 1st inning

media.team: Tampa Bay Rays New York Yankees
media.headline: Castro notches first Yankees hit
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Castro's single stands in the 2nd inning
media.bigblurb: Starlin Castro hits an infield single in the 2nd, and after replay review, Castro's hit stands as the first Yankees knock of the season

media.headline: Judge's RBI double
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Judge plates Castro with a double in the 2nd
media.bigblurb: Aaron Judge hits a double to left field, scoring Starlin Castro to put the Yankees on the board in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Torreyes' RBI groundout
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Torreyes scores Headley with a groundout
media.bigblurb: Ronald Torreyes grounds out to second base, scoring Chase Headley in the top of the 2nd inning for his first RBI of the season

media.headline: Longoria's two-run homer
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Longoria belts a two-run homer to left
media.bigblurb: Evan Longoria rips a two-run home run to left, giving the Rays a 5-2 lead in the 2nd inning on Opening Day

media.headline: Morrison's solo smash
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Morrison launches a solo homer in the 3rd
media.bigblurb: Logan Morrison belts a solo home run in the bottom of the 3rd inning, giving the Rays a 6-2 lead with his third RBI of the game

media.headline: Yankees Opening Day lineup
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Yankees starters introduced on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: The Yankees' starters are introduced on Opening Day at Tropicana Field

media.headline: Rays Opening Day lineup
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Rays starters introduced at Tropicana Field
media.bigblurb: The Rays' starters are introduced before their Opening Day matchup vs. the Yankees at Tropicana Field

media.headline: Beckham scores on an error
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Beckham scores on a throwing error in the 3rd
media.bigblurb: Gary Sanchez makes an errant throw on Mallex Smith's bunt single, allowing Tim Beckham to score to extend the Rays' lead

media.headline: National anthem at The Trop
media.blurb: NYY@TB: SSGT. Warren sings the national anthem
media.bigblurb: Staff sergeant Cherelle Warren sings the national anthem on Opening Day at Tropicana Field

media.headline: Owner Sternberg on Opening Day
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Rays owner discusses Opening Day at The Trop
media.bigblurb: Rays principal owner Stuart Sternberg discusses celebrating Opening Day at Tropicana Field

media.headline: Castro's hit stands after review
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Yanks' first hit of 2017 stands after review
media.bigblurb: Starlin Castro hits an infield single in the 2nd, and after replay review, it stands as the first Yankees hit of the season

media.headline: Cash discusses Opening Day
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Cash on Archer's start, Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Rays manager Kevin Cash discusses Chris Archer's start on Opening Day at Tropicana Field

media.headline: Archer escapes a jam
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Archer works out of a bases-loaded jam
media.bigblurb: With the bases loaded, Chris Archer gets Gary Sanchez to ground out to shortstop, preserving the Rays' lead in the 7th inning

media.headline: 'God Bless America' at The Trop
media.blurb: NYY@TB: SSGT. Warren sings during 7th-inning stretch
media.bigblurb: Staff sergeant Cherelle Warren sings 'God Bless America' during the 7th-inning stretch at Tropicana Field

media.headline: Holder fans Longoria
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Holder strikes out Longoria in the 7th
media.bigblurb: Jonathan Holder strikes out Evan Longoria swinging to begin the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Shreve escapes a tight spot
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Shreve works out of a bases-loaded jam
media.bigblurb: With the bases loaded, Chasen Shreve strikes out Brad Miller looking to end the 8th inning

media.headline: Carter's first RBI with Yanks
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Carter plates Headley with a sac fly in 9th
media.bigblurb: Chris Carter lifts a sacrifice fly to left field, scoring Chase Headley for his first RBI in a Yankees uniform

media.headline: Tanaka's first strikeout
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Tanaka fans Smith to end the 1st inning
media.bigblurb: Masahiro Tanaka strikes out Mallex Smith swinging to end the 1st inning for the first strikeout of the game

media.headline: Bird's diving stop
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Bird makes a diving stop in the 5th
media.bigblurb: Greg Bird dives to make the stop on a grounder off the bat of Logan Morrison and and flips to Adam Warren who steps on first base

media.headline: Norris' first Rays hit
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Norris singles to left for his first Rays hit
media.bigblurb: Derek Norris lines a single to left field on Opening Day for his first hit with the Rays

media.headline: Dickerson gets the first hit
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Dickerson notches the first hit of the game
media.bigblurb: Corey Dickerson lines a single to center field for the first hit of the game on Opening Day at Tropicana Field

media.headline: Archer fans five on Opening Day
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Archer tosses seven innings of two-run ball
media.bigblurb: Chris Archer strikes out five and walks one over seven innings of two-run ball on Opening Day vs. the Yankees

media.headline: Miller throws out Holliday
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Miller nabs Holliday at first, call stands
media.bigblurb: Brad Miller fields a grounder by Matt Holliday and flips to first base for the out, which stands following a Yankees challenge in the 1st

media.headline: Kiermaier's double to left
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Kiermaier lifts a double to left in the 1st
media.bigblurb: Kevin Kiermaier hits a double to left field, putting runners on second and third in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Headley's bunt single
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Headley beats the shift with a bunt single
media.bigblurb: Chase Headley hits a bunt single down the third-base line, beating the shift for the second time in the game

media.headline: Headley's single to left
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Headley beats the shift with a single to left
media.bigblurb: Chase Headley singles to left field against the shift in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Colome closes the door
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Colome retires Bird to record the save
media.bigblurb: Alex Colome gets Greg Bird to fly out, recording the save as the Rays win, 7-3, on Opening Day

media.headline: Longoria on Opening Day win
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Longo talks his homer in Opening Day victory
media.bigblurb: Rays third baseman Evan Longoria discusses his first home run of the season in the club's 7-3 Opening Day win over the Yankees

media.headline: 4/2/17 CG: NYY@TB
media.blurb: 4/2/17 Condensed Game: NYY@TB
media.bigblurb: 4/2/17 Condensed Game: NYY@TB

media.headline: Recap: NYY 3, TB 7
media.blurb: 4/2/17: Rays strike early to win on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Evan Longoria hit a two-run homer and Logan Morrison tallied three RBIs as Chris Archer picked up the win on Opening Day

media.headline: Must C: Longoria finds his spot
media.blurb: Must C Crushed: Longoria homers to familiar spot
media.bigblurb: Evan Longoria hits the first home run of 2017 to a similar spot where he connected on a memorable walk-off homer during the 2011 season

media.headline: Girardi on season-opening loss
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Girardi on Tanaka's pitching struggles, loss
media.bigblurb: Joe Girardi talks about Masahiro Tanaka's struggles in the season-opening loss to the Rays and the lack of ability to produce runs

media.headline: Tanaka on difficult start
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Tanaka discusses difficult Opening Day start
media.bigblurb: Yankees pitcher Masahiro Tanaka discusses his struggles during a 7-3 Opening Day loss to the Rays

media.headline: Archer on Opening Day victory
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Archer on his victorious Opening Day start
media.bigblurb: Rays pitcher Chris Archer discusses his impressive Opening Day start in the club's 7-3 victory over the Yankees

media.headline: Cash on Opening Day victory
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Cash discusses Rays' Opening Day win
media.bigblurb: Rays manager Kevin Cash discusses Chris Archer and the team's offense after the team's 7-3 win over the Yankees on Opening Day

media.headline: Pruitt makes MLB debut
media.blurb: NYY@TB: Pruitt makes MLB debut in relief for Rays
media.bigblurb: Rays pitcher Austin Pruitt makes his Major League debut in the top of the 9th and gives up a hit to the first batter he faces
